channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙は、エレナ・チェルニー氏を新チーム長に指名した際、ニューヨークの基準・倫理チームの4人とロンドンの1人を解雇した（Chris Roush/Talking Biz News）。
item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
The Wall Street Journal laid off four people in New York and one in London on its Standards and Ethics team when it named Elena Cherney as new head of the team  —  The Wall Street Journal laid off five people on its standards and ethics team last week when it named Elena Cherney as the new head of standards and ethics.

item.title: ハリウッドのアナリストやマーケティング担当者は、TikTokが禁止されれば、新しい映画や番組に対するアプリのマーケティング力が失われるため、潜在的なプラス面は少なくなると述べている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Hollywood analysts and marketers say any potential upside from a TikTok ban would be lessened by the loss of the app's marketing power for new movies and shows  —  Right now, there appears to be much less urgency in the Senate to move forward on a measure aimed at forcing TikTok to cut its China ties …

item.title: ミーガン・フォックス、イドリス・エルバ、キアヌ・リーブスといったハリウッド俳優が、かつて汚名を着せられたビデオゲームに参入している。
item.description:
Just Lunning / New York Times:
Hollywood actors like Megan Fox, Idris Elba, and Keanu Reeves are leaping into video games, a once stigmatized medium now seen as a unique platform for stories  —  Onscreen stars have increasingly been going virtual.  Jodie Comer and David Harbour are making their video game debuts in a remake …

item.title: 5月のローンチから2023年12月までに100万以上のダウンロードを記録した定額制アプリ「NYTオーディオ」について、NYTのオーディオ部門責任者ポーラ・スッチマンにインタビュー（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
An interview with NYT's head of audio Paula Szuchman about its subscription-only NYT Audio app, which had 1M+ downloads between its May launch and December 2023  —  The app is only available to New York Times news and all-access subscribers.  —  The New York Times' subscription …

item.title: アドウィーク誌がライアン・ジョーを編集長に任命、ジョーは過去3年間広告担当編集長を務めたBusiness Insiderから移籍（アドウィーク誌）
item.description:
Adweek:
Adweek appoints Ryan Joe as editor-in-chief; Joe joins from Business Insider, where he has spent the last three years as its advertising editor  —  He joins from Business Insider, where he spent 3 years as advertising editor  —  As it celebrates its 45th anniversary, ADWEEK is entering …

item.title: Xの動画への軸足は、過去のソーシャルメディア・トレンドを反映したものだが、TikTokやその他のプラットフォームからのユーザー作成動画への依存は、長期的な成功を保証しないかもしれない（John Herrman/New York Magazine）。
item.description:
John Herrman / New York Magazine:
X's pivot to video mirrors past social media trends, but its reliance on user-generated videos from TikTok and other platforms may not ensure long-term success  —  It's going video-first by posting every other platform's videos last.  —  In June, Twitter started telling investors that video was the future of the platform.

item.title: YouTuberのMrBeastがPrime Videoと契約し、1000人が出場するリアリティ・コンペティション番組「Beast Games」を制作、優勝者には賞金500万ドルを約束（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
YouTuber MrBeast announces a deal with Prime Video for Beast Games, a reality-competition show with 1,000 contestants, promising the winner a $5M cash prize  —  MrBeast, the YouTuber known for big-money giveaways, is going bigger than ever with his new show on Amazon's Prime Video.

item.title: Ofcomの裁定を受け、マイケル・ブッカー編集局長はGBニュースのスタッフに宛てた電子メールで、スタッフはルール内にとどまることを "倍増 "する必要があると述べている（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
In an email to GB News staff following the Ofcom ruling, editorial director Michael Booker says staff need to “double down” on staying within the rules  —  Michael Booker said GB News staff need to “double down” on staying within the rules.  —  GB News editorial director Michael Booker …

item.title: TikTok、クリエイターの収益化プログラム「Creator Rewards」を開始。「検索価値」「オリジナリティ」「再生時間」「視聴者のエンゲージメント」に応じて報酬が支払われる（Mia Sato/The Verge）
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
TikTok launches Creator Rewards, a creator monetization program that has payouts based on “search value”, originality, play duration, and audience engagement  —  TikTok is leaning in even more to its app being used like a search engine.  —  Creators making money on the platform …

item.title: ユーチューブ、AIを使ったリアルな動画にアップロードチェックリストによるラベル付けを義務付け、明らかに非現実的な動画にはラベルは不要に（Clare Duffy/CNN）
item.description:
Clare Duffy / CNN:
YouTube now requires creators to label their realistic-looking videos made using AI, via an upload checklist; clearly unrealistic videos will not need a label  —  New York CNN —  —  Starting Monday, YouTube creators will be required to label when realistic-looking videos …

item.title: 情報源Merriam-Webster辞書などを出版するブリタニカ百科事典は、6月にも開始される可能性のあるIPOで10億ドルの評価を求めている（Amy Or/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Amy Or / Bloomberg:
Sources: Encyclopaedia Britannica, which publishes books like the Merriam-Webster dictionary, is seeking a $1B valuation in an IPO that could launch in June  —  - Publisher and education tech firm may launch IPO soon as June  — Chicago-based firm's units include Merriam-Webster, Melingo AI

item.title: オーセンティック・ブランズがスポーツ・イラストレイテッドの出版権を10年間、ザ・プレイヤーズ・トリビューンのオーナーであるミニッツ・メディアにライセンス。
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
Authentic Brands licenses Sports Illustrated's publishing rights to The Players' Tribune owner Minute Media for 10 years, with plans to keep the print edition  —  Minute Media, owner of The Players' Tribune, has struck a deal to operate Sports Illustrated for at least 10 years.

item.title: BBCとAmazon Musicが提携し、広告付きのBBCポッドキャストを英国外で初めてストリーミング・サービスで公開（Georg Szalai/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / Hollywood Reporter:
The BBC and Amazon Music partner to release ad-supported BBC podcasts on the streaming service for the first time outside of the UK  —  Subscribers to Amazon's Prime and Amazon Music Unlimited services can “exclusively access a curated suite of over 50 of the BBC's most popular podcasts ad-free.”

item.title: Ofcomは、保守党の政治家による5つのGBニュース番組が公平性規則に違反しているとし、同チャンネルに "通告 "した（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Ofcom rules that five GB News programs presented by Conservative politicians have broken its due impartiality rules and puts the channel “on notice”  —  Programmes presented by Jacob Rees-Mogg, Esther McVey and Philip Davies were found in breach.

item.title: Sunoは音楽制作の「民主化」を目指しており、そのモデルはテキストプロンプトを使って人間のボーカルを含む曲を作曲することができる（Brian Hiatt/Rolling Stone）。
item.description:
Brian Hiatt / Rolling Stone:
Inside generative AI music startup Suno, whose model can compose songs, including human vocals, using a text prompt, as Suno aims to “democratize” music making  —  Suno wants everyone to be able to produce their own pro-level songs — but what does that mean for artists?
